review_text: Great energy while teaching and super informative!

I thoroughly enjoyed this course! I learned a lot and feel more confident in developing my brand. The only reason I didn't give this course the full 5 stars is because there seems to be a technical issue with the quizzes. The material seems to be from the lesson ahead, which would have material that hasn't been covered yet. It is quite difficult to navigate the course because of that, as I was left guessing most of the time. Other than that, Goldie is an incredible speaker and motivator and I will definitely be seeking out more of her content!

Very informative and interesting to watch! :)
Learned a lot and I can definitely recommend this course <3

This was an absolutely amazing course!  Goldie gave such excellent strategies that I am going to implement to improve my brand.  She is so fun, exiting and interactive with explaining her lessons.  I highly recommend this course!

It is a very very basic course. If you have some idea about branding, chances are you won't learn anything new. There are some good concepts but no depth, no information, no framework. It is more like an introduction that you can find anywhere. But it is NOT a course.
Great, helpful and easy to follow course. I would have appreciated some more concrete examples but overall I thought it is excellent.
She doesn't explain the theory only but she gives practical exercises to create a personal brand. I love it.
For someone who promotes being authentic, she seemed very fake.  From the green hair to the choreographed hand gestures to the timed head tilts, it was hard to take the presenter seriously.
helpful content for sure. A lot for me to process and implement!

This was a great course! It gave me actionable steps to start working on to grow my personal brand. I highly recommend taking a couple hours and educating yourself on the importance of your own personal brand.
Very informative. Just when i thought i knew it all.
Goldieâ€™s synergy made all the information simple to grasp and appreciate!
Little to no specific info. All about "You have to have this and that". However, very few action items you can use as a takeaway. Moreover, tests are like "choose the best word".
so much value, such outstanding charisma, great choice to have her teach this course.
Goldie has engaging energy and lots of great tips, tricks, and homework to offer! I enjoyed this course. It helped me focus on what's important on my own branding journey.
Great course.

If we talking about the info in this course - most of it is usseful,  but some of it just not really relevant for simple freelance creators. 
Also there is too much self promoting of the author. Gave me some feeling that i payed 40$ not for learning something, but to hear a lot about how great is the author.

If we talking about the way of telling us that info - it's really annoying.
When i wanna get some proffecional info, i want to get the info and NOT being treated like some retarded kid, and hear "Weeee!" 2-3 times per video.

Just my opinion ofc.
I am so glad I took this course and I leaned a lot. Some of the information I knew about but it was really great
Goldie is a consummate pro. Great course!

Great content, perfect timing. Goldie does a great job breaking ideas down into actionable milestones in a refreshingly relatable way. I'm excited to apply the principles as a I "revisit" my personal brand strategy. Highly recommend!
Exactly what I was looking for!
